name: XPDC
description:
'''XPDC''' (a [[word play|play]] on ''Ekspedisi'', [[Malay language|Malay]] for "expedition") is a [[Malaysia|Malaysian]] [[rock music|rock]] band formed in 1988 at [[Kuala Lumpur]], consisting of Mael (deceased), Izo, Man Tobey (deceased) and Yazid. They known as "King of Funfair"  in the late 80s. 

Among their hit songs include "C.I.N.T.A.", "Titian Perjalanan", "Hairan bin Ajaib", "Teman", "Semangat yang Hilang", "Hentian Ini", and "Sakinah".
